entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon then changing to periods of rain late in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023
